BASIC CASE INFORMATION.citation: Kenya Power And Lighting Company Limited v Patrick Njane Mbugua another [2020] eKLR
BASIC CASE INFORMATION.subject_matter: Negligence and vicarious liability in a road traffic accident.

PARTIES.plaintiff_appellant: Kenya Power and Lighting Company Limited

LEGAL ISSUES.key_legal_issues: Ownership of the vehicle and liability for the accident.

LEGAL PRINCIPLES.precedent_value: The case reinforces the application of vicarious liability in ownership disputes.

PROCEDURAL ASPECTS.procedural_history: Accident on 25th November 2007, trial court judgment on 27th January 2016, appeal filed subsequently.
